title: Love and other impossible pursuits (2009)(dd5.1)(nl subs) TBS
description:
LOVE AND OTHER IMPOSSIBLE PURSUITS (2009)




alternatieve titel: The other woman


Verenigde Staten
Komedie / Drama
119 minuten

geregisseerd door Don Roos
met Natalie Portman, Lisa Kudrow en Scott Cohen

Emilia Greenleaf is een jonge vrouw, die pas met Jack Woolf getrouwd is
en meteen zwanger is geraakt. Ze verliezen dit kind echter en het huwelijk
loopt nu niet echt goed. Ze tracht haar wankele huwelijk te redden door
een betere verstandhouding aan te gaan met haar nukkige vijf-jarige
stiefzoon, William.


English

Storyline

In Manhattan, twenty-two year-old Harvard lawyer Emilia Greenleaf has a crush on her boss, Jack Woolf, and they have an affair. Jack's marriage is a sham but his son, William, is his pride and joy. Emilia soon discovers she's pregnant, and Jack divorces his wife, Carolyn, in order to marry her. His son is poisoned against the partnership by his mother, and resented by his stepmother. Emilia, who has issues with her womanizer father, delivers Isabel but the baby dies. The marriage begins to suffer and William unexpectedly steps in to help.
